name: JA Flight Training
about: JA Flight Training, located at Chicago's Aurora Airport, is a premier flight school in the Chicagoland area. Established in 2006, the school has grown from a part 61 flight school to an FAA-approved part 141 flight school, offering training up to the Airline Transport Pilot (ATP) rating. As a Cessna Pilot Center, JA Flight utilizes the King School online curriculum and features a modern fleet of Cessna aircraft and advanced simulators. The school is known for its accelerated Career Airline Pilot Program, which can get students from their first flight to a commercial rating in under 12 months. With affiliations with Southern Airways Express and collegiate programs, JA Flight provides a comprehensive and supportive environment for students to achieve their aviation goals. The school's commitment to top-notch education and its consistent 5-star reviews reflect its dedication to helping students succeed in their careers.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
